Attributes.description: Principles of grammar theory and contextualized French grammatical concepts. Emphasis on terminology and analysis of grammatical issues. Aligned with CEFR level B2 objectives.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of FREN 123, FREN 302. (or assignment based on placement test.)
